import React ,{useState}from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' const Register = () => { const [name , setName]=useState(""); const [email , setEmail]=useState(""); const [password , setPassword]=useState(""); const [confPassword , setConfPassword]=useState(""); const navigate =useNavigate(); const Register = async(ev) =>{ ev.preventDefault(); try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5001/users',{ name: name, email:email, password:password, confPassword:confPassword }); navigate("/login") } catch (error) { } } return (
Name
setName(ev.target.value)} />
Email
setEmail(ev.target.value)} />
Password
setPassword(ev.target.value)} />
Confirm Password
setConfPassword(ev.target.value)}/>
) } export default Register
